content.description: Located at CityCenterDC, this bright, inviting spot is part-osteria—equipped with a wood-burning oven—and part-market, offering local produce and specialty Italian pantry goods. Inside, you’ll find big windows overlooking colorful boutiques, an open kitchen, and a granite bar for sipping cocktails. The beverage program also offers a list of apertivi ...
content.name: Centrolina
